Articles.Content:
Hello, my name is Linus! I live in Sweden and I\'m 19 years old. I have always loved astronomy and everything around it. When I first discovered KSP I was blown away, way out of orbit. It was like a dream comming true. 

I made my first orbit around earth today (YEAH!) but it was so out of shape that I almost went in to orbit around the mun! But it\'s still orbit! 

I got so excited that I made a video with my phone calling the mission 'ApeX1' in my head.

Anyways.. gonna try for the mun soon!

Over and out!

//Linus

Gday Linus,,Welcome to the neverending calamity that is KSP. Good to have another Astro enthusiast on board. You\'re in for a treat when 15 is released. We\'re all trying to be patient, but it\'s getting hard. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome! 

 However, there is no 'Earth' in this game. So I take it you are referring to Kerbin? 

.................Or is there an undiscovered Celestial body in KSP? ;P
